testcase.name: Execute JavaScript function with and without parameter
testcase.system-out: And def getIntValue = function() {return 10;} ............................. passed Then print "Function value => ", getIntValue() ............................ passed And def getRandomValue = function() {return Math.floor(100 * Math.random());} . passed Then print "Function value => ", getRandomValue() ......................... passed And def getStringValue = function(arg1) {return "Hello "+ arg1;} .......... passed Then print "Function value => ", getStringValue("World") .................. passed
